name: Backgammon Online 2 Players: Multiplayer Free
description: Backgammon Online 2 Players is one of the oldest board games for two players. Reliably known that people have been playing this game for over 5,000 years. Backgammon perfectly improves your tactical and strategic thinking and equally with chess and dominoes Backgammon is a member of the tables family, one of the populers games in the world.
